description:
A number of scalped Apple Vision Pro pre-orders have sold on eBay for upwards of $6,000. When you just gotta have it, I guess money is no object for some. When Vision Pro pre-orders opened up on January 19th, the delivery dates for online orders quickly pushed back all the way into March. However, in-store […]

The post Scalped Vision Pro Pre-orders Have Sold for $6,000, But Justice May Yet Prevail appeared first
title: Scalped Vision Pro Pre-orders Have Sold for $6,000, But Justice May Yet Prevail

description:
Microsoft Teams now lets you hold meetings in 3D and VR, as its immersive chatting platform Microsoft Mesh has now come out of preview. Microsoft announced Mesh back in early 2021, essentially acting as the company’s foundation for building multi-user XR applications and letting cross-platform users connect in a virtual environment. It’s a bit like […]

The post Microsoft Teams Now Supports 3D & VR Meetings, Releases ‘Mesh&#
title: Microsoft Teams Now Supports 3D & VR Meetings, Releases ‘Mesh’ App on Main Quest Store

description:
Vision Pro is nearly here, but Netflix, YouTube and Spotify won’t have their respective apps on the headset’s app storefront. Netflix co-CEO Greg Peters explains why. Speaking to Stratechery, Peters says Vision Pro is “not really particularly relevant to most [Netflix] members.” Here’s the portion of the statement where Peters explains his reasoning: “We have to be […]

The post Netflix CEO on V
title: Netflix CEO on Vision Pro App Snub: “not particularly relevant to our members”
